channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MS
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MS

item.title: Report X-2024010689
item.description:
Report X-2024010689

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-29T15:11:25+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-03
  • City: OLIVE BRANCH
  • State: MS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: FOUND ON LOADSIDE NOTICED THE LEAK TURNED UP RIGHT, BROUGHT TO QA, DescribePack: THE CAPS WAS LOOSE CAUSING LEAKAGE DurationRel: -1 and MitigateEffect: IMMIDIETLY CALLED QA TO COME RETREIVE AND WAS BAGGED AND BARRELED

item.title: Report X-2024010619
item.description:
Report X-2024010619

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-02T15:12:00+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-28
  • City: OLIVE BRANCH
  • State: MS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: 1. X-2024010619 SequenceEvent: THE PACKAGE WAS FOUND INSIDE OF A HAZARDOUS TOTE IN THE QA AREA. DescribePack: THE SIDES AND BOTTOM THE BOX WAS COMPLETELY DESTROYED. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: THE PACKAGE WAS PROPERLY HANDLED USING THE CORRECT HAZARDOUS MATERIALS NEEDED AT THE TIME. 2. X-2024010620 SequenceEvent: package found in a hazardous tote in QA area. DescribePack: Loose cap or top on container. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Hazmat cleaning supplies were used.

item.title: Report X-2024010688
item.description:
Report X-2024010688

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-29T15:11:25+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-28
  • City: OLIVE BRANCH
  • State: MS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: WHILE UNLOADING PACKAGE HANDLER NOTICED THE BOX WAS WET. CALLED HAZMAT TEAM. THERE WAS NO SPILLAGE ON THE FLOOR JUST ON THE BOX. DescribePack: THE BOTTLES HAD LOOSE CAPS CAUSING CONTENTS TO LEAK OUT A LITTLE DurationRel: -1 and MitigateEffect: AS SOON AS PACKAGE HANDLER SAW BOX WAS WET THEY INFORMED THEIR MANAGER WHO CALLED QA.
